revised_title: Simple Existence Proofs of Weak and Statistical Solutions of Navier-Stokes Equations
tldr: The authors provide a simple proof of existence for weak and statistical solutions of the Navier-Stokes equations using non-standard analysis. The method is based on solving a hyperfinite-dimensional version of the equation, and the standard part of the solution gives the required weak solution of the Navier-Stokes equations. This approach simplifies and shortens the original proofs, making them more accessible.
